Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Reroute at Laramie/Maypole
ShortDescription: 57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Washington, Central, Chicago & Laramie, due to street blockage near Laramie/Maypole.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Laramie, Washington, Central, Chicago & Laramie, due to street blockage near Laramie/Maypole.

Allow extra travel time.
